name: Child Care Access Means Parents in School
objective: To support the participation of low-income parents in postsecondary education through the provision of campus-based child care services.
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended, Title IV, Part A, Subpart 7.

rules_regulations: Contact the Program Office for information.
